Gta4LegalCheckbox: I understand that this copy of Grand Theft Auto IV will be permanently attached to my non-transferrable Rockstar Games Social Club account.
Gta4LegalText: This copy of Grand Theft Auto IV will be permanently attached to your Rockstar Games Social Club account. Please ensure that the account you sign in with is the account you wish to attach to this product.
